list.name: Threshold
list.query: SELECT "sensor_value" FROM "autogen"."fluke-rspi3" WHERE mean("sensor_value">=70) and ("sensor_mac" =~ /^*$/)  GROUP BY  "sensor_mac" fill(null)

targets.query: select count(distinct("sensor_mac")) from (SELECT count("sensor_rssi")  / 2.4 FROM /^$Gateway$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "sensor_mac" fill(0))
select count(distinct("sensor_mac")) from (SELECT count("sensor_rssi")  / 2.4 FROM /^$Gateway$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "sensor_mac" fill(0))
select mean("count") from (SELECT count("sensor_rssi")  / 0.04 FROM /^$Gateway$/ WHERE $timeFilter and ("sensor_mac" =~ /^$Sensor$/) GROUP BY time(1s), "sensor_mac" fill(none))
select mean("count") from (SELECT count("sensor_rssi")  / 0.04 FROM /^$Gateway$/ WHERE $timeFilter and ("sensor_mac" =~ /^$Sensor$/) GROUP BY time(1s), "sensor_mac" fill(none))
SELECT last("sensor_rssi") AS "RSSI", last("sensor_battery") AS "BATTERY" FROM "autogen"./^$Gateway$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "sensor_type", "sensor_mac" fill(null)
SELECT last("sensor_rssi") AS "RSSI", last("sensor_battery") AS "BATTERY" FROM "autogen"./^$Gateway2$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "sensor_type", "sensor_mac" fill(null)

list.name: Sensor
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "[[Gateway]]" WITH KEY ="sensor_mac"

list.label: Alerting for
list.name: Alerting_Sensor
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "[[Gateway]]" WITH KEY ="sensor_mac"
